create_and_share: Create and share quizzes with others
easy_creation_sub: Easy quiz creation and publishing. Creating a quiz will only take a few minutes.
answer_saving_sub: If you play quiz, QuizAPP will save your answers, so you never loose them.
easy_validation_sub: QuizAPP will validate your answers and give you a detailed analysis of your answers.uizAPP validate your answers and gives you detail
how_to_create_quiz: How to create your own quiz?
step_1_create_quiz_sub: Create account on QuizAPP using register form.
step_2_create_quiz_sub:
Pomocí tlačítka vytvořit kvíz si vytvořte kvíz. Vymyslete si jméno a popis kvízu. Následně vložíte otázky.
Na výběr máte následující typy otázek:
step_3_done_sub: You have now created a quiz on QuizAPP. Now anyone can play your quiz.
does_quizapp_save_sub: **Ne**, QuizAPP neukládá žádné soukromé informace a sledovací data. QuizAPP ukládá pouze list uživatelů, vytvořené kvízy a odpovědi uživatelů.
can_i_play_quiz_no_registration: Can I play quiz without an account?
can_i_play_quiz_no_registration_sub: Unfortunately no, QuizAPP needs the user to be logged in to save the answer in the database.
quizapp_is_opensource:
QuizAPP is opensource!
